[DQR.IFRS.0080.8434] ifrs-full:PurchaseOfTreasuryShares has a value of -4,161,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:PurchaseOfTreasuryShares fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : NOK Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300IM1QSBY4SLPM26/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/telenorasa-2021-12-31-en.zip/telenorasa-2021-12-31-en/reports/tel-2021-12-31.html 34527

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 42,272,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 42,275,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 42,272,000,000 are comprised of the following:
- Netsharenetincomelossgainslossesondisposalassociatedcompaniesandandjointventures -459,000,000 + TotalProfitBeforeTaxes 10,385,000,000 + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 34,363,000,000 + AdjustmentsForFinanceCosts 2,686,000,000 + AdjustmentsForUnrealisedForeignExchangeLossesGains 1,160,000,000 + DividendsReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 532,000,000 - IncomeTaxesPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 6,113,000,000 + IncreaseDecreaseInWorkingCapital 905,000,000 - InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 2,635,000,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 220,000,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 272,000,000 + OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss 41,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 42,272,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300IM1QSBY4SLPM26/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/telenorasa-2021-12-31-en.zip/telenorasa-2021-12-31-en/reports/tel-2021-12-31.html 34527
